effect.name: Shear
effect.description: Shear a clip along the 3 axes
effect.author: Charles Yates

parameter.name: transition.repeat_off
Disable repeat
parameter.comment:
When animating properties with keyframes,
whether to repeat the animation after it reaches the last key frame.

parameter.name: transition.mirror_off
Disable mirror
parameter.comment:
When animating properties with keyframes and Disable repeat is off,
whether the animation alternates between reverses and forwards for each repetition.

parameter.name: transition.invert_scale
Invert scale
parameter.comment:
Whether to invert the Scale X and Scale Y values.
This is helpful to make animation interpolation sane because otherwise the scale values do not animate linearly.

parameter.name: transition.fix_shear_x
Shear X
parameter.comment: Shear angle around the X axis

parameter.name: transition.fix_shear_y
Shear Y
parameter.comment: Shear angle around the Y axis

parameter.name: transition.fix_shear_z
Shear Z
parameter.comment: Shear angle around the Z axis

parameter.name: transition.scale_x
Scale X
parameter.comment: Scale factor applied to the X axis

parameter.name: transition.scale_y
Scale Y
parameter.comment: Scale factor applied to the Y axis
